summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1171, for the improvement of North Sixtieth Street, from Phinney Avenue to Palatine Avenue; thence North on Palatine Avenue from North Sixtieth Street to North Sixty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein watermains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees and crosses as may be necessary for the reasonable water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 12946 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
